sense.def: Alternative Names ou tu suan shui 嘔吐酸水 , vomiting of sour water. Illness Sign of vomiting a liquid of sour flavor. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 16: 治中散，食後吐酸水方 , “Powder to regulate the center, a recipe for vomiting of sour water after one has eaten”. Tu tan shui 吐痰水 , vomiting of phlegm and water [4]

Alternative Names ou tu tan shui 嘔吐 痰水. Illness Sign of vomiting of thin phlegm. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 8: 茯苓湯，主風痰氣發，即嘔吐欠呿， 煩悶不安，或吐痰水者方 , “Decoction with fu ling . It controls wind phlegm qi effusion, that is, a recipe for vomiting and yawning, vexation, heart-pressure, and restlessness. In some cases there is vomiting of phlegm and water ”.
